DescriptionData.Title: Dewey's Balloon and Clown Notebook - Dewey
DescriptionData.Description: A balloon book with clowns in mind. Contains new balloon creations, toys and some "bits of business." Includes: Basic Twists, Balloon Handling Hints, Albert the Alligator, Choo Choo Train, Parrot in a Perch, Bugsy the Bunny, Cowboy (on a Horse?), Swan Laying an Egg, Knight, Stallion, Jack Rabbit, Horsefly (Pegasus), Parrot in a Perch Joke, Chicken, Eagle, Vulture, Longhorn, Improved Reindeer, Armadillo, Snail, Camel, and Gospel applications, plus assorted Balloon tricks. 52 page, illustrated pamphlet.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes new balloon creations, toy making, and balloon tricks
Essential tips for clowns and entertainers of all levels who want to work with balloons
